Sharing Experience
Our team members are always ready to share their experience as they themselves run half marathons, swam across the Bosporus, and prepare for triathlon competitions!

We work to ensure that your sports activities benefit your health and bring joy to you and your loved ones!
Teaching Running
We help with learning the proper running technique! We have a great partnership with the largest running school in Russia - I LOVE RUNNING

Polar FT1 Heart Rate Monitor

For the first steps in heart rate-based training
LEARN MORE
  • You will hear audible alerts for your target heart rate during workouts.
  • You will see an informative graphical indicator of target heart rate training zones.
  • You will also see information about calories burned during workouts.
  • You can review data from 10 training sessions.

Customer Reviews

Irina Ivanchenko
2 Half Marathons

I didn't know what to buy for myself - I turned to the folks at RunSmart - they helped me choose a heart rate monitor that fit my goals and financial capabilities. After some time, I decided to upgrade my gadget - without hesitation, I went back to them.

New goals - new gadget!

Thank you, RunSmart!

Ivan Syomochkin
1 Half Marathon

Awesome thing - the heart rate monitor. I used to run without one. Turns out, I was only making things worse for myself.
Bought a heart rate monitor, and as a bonus, received a training session. They did the first workout with me, taught me how to use the new gadget. They also explained the basics of anatomy, and we created a training plan for the next month.

With their help, I prepared for my first half marathon! Thank you!!!

Yulia Dashkina
2 Half Marathons

I couldn't start running for a long time because every time I tried, it became difficult and I gave up. I heard about RunSmart and running with heart rate control from my friends and decided to give it a try.

I called them, they asked about my goals and recommended a very interesting option with a discount! Now I run and enjoy it! I've already completed 2 half marathons and several shorter runs, and I don't intend to stop!

Thank you!!!

Kyiv, Ukraine
